name: PAINT POWER UPS
description:
Run through puddles of paint to get various power ups to help you complete this mini game!

Challenged myself to build a game in 3 hours (hence why its such a bare bones operation) but I'm pretty proud of what I managed to churn out to be honest.

In the future I may develop this into a full game that's actually balanced and a bit more enjoyable, but I'll keep this up as a dmeo of what I can do with only 3 hours to design, do the art, program and assemble a whole project.

Enjoy!
